body: On the train home from #ffconf with a heart full of love and a head full of ideas Julie and @remysharp.com sure know how to pick a lineup and and put on a great day

First #ffconf yesterday with the team. We laughed, learnt and came out inspired. Thanks to @remysharp.com and the rest of the @ffconf.org team for organising. Hopefully we‚Äôll be back next year! Now off to build some small useless projects!

#ffconf Headed back home with great experiences and passion for doing good on the web. FFConf is such a special experience, thanks to @ffconf.org and everyone involved including the speakers for such an enriching day out. üíñ
#ffconf thank you for the vegan snacks! üòç

Following along with #ffconf today - thanks to their scholarship program, I attended in 2016 as a self-teaching stay-at-home parent, with a goal of being a developer 'someday'. To chat with others about the web, the industry, was an incredible opportunity and made me really feel it could happen.

Really enjoyed @ffconf.org yesterday in Brighton, was really insightful. It's a nice reminder that coding isn't all that makes up being an engineer. Its so much about how you think, and work with others #ffconf

I had an absolutely wonderful time at @ffconf.org in Brighton yesterday. I'm reminded to reflect on my purpose, direction, how I'm building things, how to critique & build, for communities, for networks, for people and relationships. #ffconf is my annual time to recharge and refocus, in community. üíï

Well, #FFConf today was a wonderful balm for the soul. The talks were excellent, and it was really, really good to see people I hadn‚Äôt seen in a while‚ÄîI needed that. Thank you, Julie. Thank you, Remy.: https://adactio.com/notes/21547
Fantastic day of talks at #FFConf!
So impressed by the quality of talks at @ffconf.org so far today. Great variety and super insightful #ffconf
I've seen too many talks about AI that are gushing praise, or doom and gloom. @tink.bsky.social gave an amazing balanced talk on the practical uses, and pitfalls of AI and accessibility. #ffconf
Having a lovely first time at #ffconf ! Such a well curated and cozy conference ü•∞

Heading home after a wonderful #ffconf. It was great to meet so many web friends in real life, and see some inspiring talks. Buzzing with ideas now! Thank you @rem and co üôè Hopefully see you next year üëã

Back home from a wonderful two days in Brighton thanks to @ffconf and the fantastic organisers @rem and @Julieanne

Learned so much, got inspired, made new friends, finally got to see some old ones in 4D! Such a great event, so much care and soul put into it.

‚ÄòTil next year!

Had such a blast at @ffconf yesterday. I‚Äôm not sure how @rem and @Julieanne manage to fill this conf with such good eggs year after year but they do and they make imo the best all around conf on the scene.

Huge love to the team behind it! I‚Äôll be back next year

I need to join all the praise of #ffconf. Had high expectations and it didn't disappoint (except maybe that it felt over too quickly). So many lovely and interesting people doing good things on the web!

Can't wait for next year and for the recordings to come out

I've had the best day at #ffconf

I've never been to a conference with talks that bring programming and tech into the real world! I'm 100% coming back next year.

Here are some no context highlights from the eclectic mix of talks.

I don't really have enough words to express my gratitude to @rem and @julie, and all the @ffconf team for making me feel so welcome and looked after.

Meeting new friends and hanging with old friends at #ffconf was an absolute blast cya next year
#ffconf has cemented itself as my favourite conference. Thoroughly enjoyed today, thanks again to all who made it possible!

Thank you SO much to our speakers, to our volunteers, to all the delegates, to all our sponsors, to everyone who donated to our scholarship programme...thank you. I am slightly broken, emotionally fragile but my heart is full @ffconf #ffconf
Thank you @rem @Julieanne for inviting me to speak at @ffconf and for looking after us speakers with such love and care I cannot recommend speaking at #ffconf more highly!
@ffconf fantastic day! Diverse interesting talks by some very clever people. Big well done to the #ffconf team who organised it. Left feeling #inspired
Turned out you can organise a diverse conference finding enough women to speak and without having to *teach* women and minorities how to send CFP.#ffconf kudos again for being the best
So happy to see a group of runners going out for our first pre conf run. Thank you @chetbox @mattbee

As usual, I had a fantastic time at @ffconf - I genuinely feel so inspired and most importantly feeling confident. It is always a great way to end the year and look forward to what I can do next. Thank you @Julieanne and @rem gotta write that blog post ASAP.

I‚Äôm on the train home after a marvellous time at #ffconf

A good conference like that is such a massive morale boost which I definitely needed.

It was so expertly curated and organised by @Julieanne and @rem.

I‚Äôm all conferenced out for this year now, with a full heart.

Had such a great day @ffconf yeaterday, it‚Äôs the only conference I‚Äôll sign up to without knowing who will be speaking because I have absolute trust that @rem and @Julieanne will put on an amazing day. Can‚Äôt wait for next year!

Attending @ffconf in Brighton on ffriday gave me LIFE. I feel energised by getting to hang out with so many lovely ffriends, and having made a ffew new ones. Such a ffantastic event, I hope it never ends :')
#ffconf was absolutely brilliant. Thanks all!
@rem Last Friday was my first #ffconf - was blown away by the quality and variety of talks. Fantastic achievement from the conf team!
As I head home, Thank you, again to @rem, @Julieanne and the volunteers for @ffconf. Incredible event and I felt incredibly taken care of.
Back home & wondering where to start with all the inspiration I got whilst at #ffconf. Thank you @Julieanne & @rem for an excellent day.
Fantastic set of speakers, interesting and exciting topics, great day at @ffconf. Thanks and congratulations to @rem and @Julieanne!
#ffconf is a wrap: what a truly inspirational event with so many interesting topics. Glad that I finally was able to attend.

Attended #ffconf in 2016 thanks to @rem and @julieanne's scholarship. The inspirational speakers and welcoming community were a big part of giving me the confidence to keep coding, attend bootcamp and become a developer. Cheers guys, hope everyone has a great time @ffconf
Yes! #ffconf was amazing. Had an inspiring day listening to awesome people, taking about super interesting stuff. Almost too good.
must be the most comfy seats of any conference I attended - so glad I finally made it - #fullfrontalconf \m/
Practical, inspiring & progressive - its rare a tech conference delivers on all of them but @ffconf pulls it off. Quality gig

Speaking at #ffconf the last two days has been such a pleasure and a privilege. Thank you so much for building such an inclusive, friendly event and community @rem and @Julieanne! Thank you everyone who came and spoke to me. It means the world to this little ball of anxiety

As a web developer I couldn't have asked for anything more. #ffconf you not just talk about diversity and inclusivity you also put them in action. Every topic and speaker were unique and diverse. Thanks for making me a better developer. Hopefully I will make it to next one.

My heart is so full after an amazing #ffconf. Conferences like this wouldn't be possible without passionate organizers like @Julieanne & @rem. Thank you so much for having me and making our web communities better
Almost home after a fantastic day once again at #ffconf. A great atmosphere as usual and another set of inspiring speakers.Thanks to @rem and @Julieanne for putting it all together :)
Had such a fantastic time in Brighton for #ffconf. Huge thanks to @rem & @Julieanne for awarding me a diversity scholarship to attend. So thankful for the opportunity and I learnt so much.
So, #ffconf was awesome. I saw pretty much all the talks twice and I never got bored. I had really interesting conversations at the after parties with people I've never met before.
Not sure how many junios went to #ffconf but I feel honoured to be one of them.Great conference & superb inspiring talks!Bring it on ff2016
Really impressed with the diversity of speakers at #ffconf
All my #ffconf photos are now on Flickr https://www.flickr.com/photos/sebleedelisle/albums/72157673656076087 ‚Ä¶ congrats to @rem and @Julieanne for pulling it off again!
#ffconf has just, in a single day, changed me as person ‚Äî we can become good tech friends of so many more people than I had thought! Made possible thanks to dazzling captioning by @whitecoatcapxg
Love @miss_jwo's talk! So many practical tips and advice on how to run inclusive events and spaces. Makes me feel I definitely chose the right industry #ffconf
Thank you #ffconf for going strong for 10 years! We loved being here this week, really happy we could support this conference

Thanks to all the speakers and organisers at #ffconf . It was brilliant, thought provoking hysterically funny at times and a great demonstration of what a lovely community of front end technologists we have.
